properties.displayName: Change Winevt Channel Access Permission Via Registry
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where ((RegistryValueData contains "(A;;0x1;;;LA)" or RegistryValueData contains "(A;;0x1;;;SY)" or RegistryValueData contains "(A;;0x5;;;BA)") and RegistryKey contains "\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\WINEVT\\Channels" and RegistryKey endswith "\\ChannelAccess") and (not(((InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\TiWorker.exe" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\") or InitiatingProcessFolderPath =~ "C:\\Windows\\servicing\\TrustedInstaller.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects tampering with the "ChannelAccess" registry key in order to change access to Windows event channel.
